get_support_fast: Get support fast. Stay in control.
anonymous_reporting_desc: Anonymous reporting with client‑side encryption, AI triage, and verified resources — built with privacy first.
no_account_required: No account required. You control what to share.
our_mission_desc: SafeSpeak is dedicated to providing a secure platform for individuals to report incidents anonymously while connecting them with verified support resources. We believe in empowering users through privacy-focused technology and community support.
secure_private_desc: Your privacy is our top priority. All reports are encrypted and anonymous.
fast_response_desc: Get connected to support resources quickly when you need them most.
trusted_network_desc: Verified organizations and resources you can rely on for support.
our_commitment_desc: At SafeSpeak, we're committed to creating a safer digital space for everyone. Our platform is built with cutting-edge security measures and designed with user privacy as the foundation. We continuously work to improve our services and expand our network of support resources.
empowering_voices_desc: In moments when reporting sensitive incidents matters most, survivors and witnesses face a critical gap: staying safe while preserving credible, court-admissible evidence. Conventional channels expose identities, leak context, and leave records vulnerable to tampering. SafeSpeak closes this security and evidence gap by enabling secure, private, and evidential reporting—so people can document, protect, and share what happened on their terms. With a privacy-first design and forensic integrity at its core, SafeSpeak safeguards identities while guaranteeing that the record remains verifiable and intact.
e2e_encryption_desc: Data remains encrypted from capture to verification, ensuring only intended parties can decrypt.
blockchain_proof_desc: Cryptographic proofs anchor evidence immutably, enabling independent verification of tamper-resistance.
pii_redaction_desc: Automated pipelines protect identities while preserving evidential value.
stealth_quick_exit_desc: Discreet UI patterns and instant safe-exit flows reduce exposure during high-risk use.
the_team: The Team Behind the Mission - DeadPixel
remember_me_desc: Keep me logged in for faster access
location_services_desc: Allow access to your location for nearby resources
